title: Long Way North
writer: Claire Paoletti, Claire Paoletti, Patricia Valeix, Patricia Valeix, Fabrice de Costil (adaptation), Fabrice de Costil (dialogue), Fabrice de Costil (screenplay)
actors: Christa Théret, Féodor Atkine, Antony Hickling, Thomas Sagols
plot: In 1882, a young Russian aristocrat goes on an epic adventure to find out what happened to her grandfather and save her family's reputation.
